paper_title: A weighted Adams' inequality in $\mathbb{R}^4$ and applications
abstract: In this paper, we establish a weighted Adams' inequality in some appropriate weighted Sobolev space in $\mathbb{R}^4$. Then we give an improvement inequality by proving the concentration-compactness result. In the last part, we consider an application to elliptic equation involving new exponential growth at infinity in $\mathbb{R}^4$.
